title: Adamant platebody (h3)

properties.name: description
properties.value: An adamant platebody (h3) is an item obtained from medium Treasure Trails. All of the adamant heraldic platebodies have the same stat bonuses as the adamant platebody. As with all Treasure Trails and adamant armour, this cannot be made with the Smithing skill. It requires 30 Defence to equip.

Item ID23398

An adamant platebody (h3) is an item obtained from medium Treasure Trails. All of the adamant heraldic platebodies have the same stat bonuses as the adamant platebody. As with all Treasure Trails and adamant armour, this cannot be made with the Smithing skill. It requires 30 Defence to equip.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-30-15
 Defence bonuses
+65+63+55-6+63
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (medium)N/A 11/1,133

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

[[File:Adamant platebody (h3) detail.png|left|130px]]
An '''adamant platebody (h3)''' is an item obtained from [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. All of the adamant heraldic platebodies have the same stat bonuses as the [[adamant platebody]]. As with all Treasure Trails and [[adamant armour]], this cannot be made with the [[Smithing]] [[skill]]. It requires 30 [[Defence]] to equip.
